mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Mckinzee, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Mckinzee, John Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound of the chest upper region. Ball entered left side and passed transversely through right lobe and would exit in axilla. Location Wounded: In action at Piedmont, VA on Hunter's Raid. Date Wounded: 1864/06. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Returned to duty.
